title: Software Engineer
description:
• Tulip Shop Tavern: http://tulipshoptavern.com
    • Custom CMS build for bar/restaurant Tulip Shop Tavern
    • Admin demo available at: http://tulipshoptavern.chrisubick.io
    • Node.js, Express, React, DynamoDB, Serverless AWS deployment
    • Social media setup
  • Valley Oak Winery: http://valleyoakwinery.com
    • Custom website built for Valley Oak Winery
    • Node.js, Express, React, DynamoDB, Serverless AWS deployment
    • Graphic design: logo, web assets, wine labels, promotional material
    • Email campaigns: setup, design, implementation
    • Social media setup
  • Pangram Game: http://pangram.chrisubick.io
    • A fun word game
    • Node.js, Express, React, DynamoDB, Serverless AWS deployment
  • United Association: http://ua.org
    • Umbraco CMS built for the United Association union of plumbers, fitters, welders and service techs
    • Custom deployment process and design
  • Contract Software Engineer for NuTandem Software: http://www.nutandem.com
    • Custom SharePoint web part development
    • SharePoint installations

title: Senior Software Engineer, Technical Lead
description:
• Lead a remote team of full stack engineers in a fast pace Agile environment
  • Developed a production full stack case management web application for a Government customer (Java, React, AngularJS, MSSQL, AWS EC2, RDS, Concourse, Terraform)
  • Spent 20% of time contributing to internal company Center of Excellence program and other internal software architecture and development projects
  • Five direct reports
  • Mentor developers with weekly one-on-one meetings
  • Provide project guidance and develop best practices in all aspects of our SDLC
  • Write and develop best practices for testing, including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end automated tests and frontend unit tests
  • Develop and maintain automated CI/CD pipeline with multiple cloud environments for development and testing using Concourse and Terraform
  • Multiple short demo and code challenge projects to win new work for the company.
  • Team lead on a large government project building a proposal management system that connected multiple microservice systems together (Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, MongoDB, DynamoDB, Angular, React, Material Design, Concourse, Terraform, AWS ECS)

title: Software Developer
description:
• Full stack software development
  • Worked with SQL servers and .NET N-Tier web MVC applications and AngularJS clients
  • Many of the applications are hosted in Azure where I made significant contributions to the CI/CD pipeline using Octopus deploy
  • Introduced new technology and developed proof of concept applications that drove the business towards modernizing many of their internal and external applications.

title: Software Developer Intern
description:
• Software developer on the Process & Efficiency team where I worked on two .NET MVC applications updating existing code and delivering bug fixes to all levels of the application including SQL, WPF and Razor view updates.
  • Worked on their implementation of the Rally project management tool using Node.js, ExtJS
  • Helped develop SharePoint web parts to deliver business needs to a custom SharePoint application used as a knowledge management system
  • Develop an application that delivered custom data charting about stack traces from new solid state drive technology using Node.js, MongoDB, Express, AngularJS and utilized D3.js to create charts.
